meanings.english: work; job; employment; the tasks you do for your job or livelihood

examples.german: Ich gehe heute früh zur Arbeit.
examples.english: I’m going to work early today.

examples.german: Ich habe heute viel Arbeit zu erledigen.
examples.english: I have a lot of work to get done today.
examples.chinese: 我今天有很多工作要完成。

examples.german: Nach dem Studium fand sie schnell Arbeit.
examples.english: After graduating, she quickly found work.
examples.chinese: 毕业后她很快找到了工作。

meanings.english: a piece of work; an academic/artistic work or paper

examples.german: Sie schreibt eine wissenschaftliche Arbeit über Klimapolitik.
examples.english: She is writing an academic paper on climate policy.
examples.chinese: 她正在写一篇关于气候政策的学术论文。

examples.german: Seine Arbeit wurde mit einem Preis ausgezeichnet.
examples.english: His work was awarded a prize.

meanings.english: effort; labor; the exertion required to achieve something
meanings.chinese: 努力；劳作；为达成目标所需的付出

examples.english: That takes a lot of work.

meanings.english: physics: work (force times distance), measured in joules
meanings.chinese: 物理学：功（力乘以位移），单位焦耳

examples.german: In der Physik ist Arbeit Kraft mal Weg.
examples.english: In physics, work is force times distance.
examples.chinese: 在物理学中，功等于力乘以位移。

examples.english: The work done amounts to 20 joules.

collocations.english: to get/finish work; to complete tasks
to perform/do work; to make a contribution
